researchtable:imbued: This item cannot be used for research
minecraft:smite: Attacks deal increased damage to undead.
minecraft:bane_of_arthropods: Attacks deal increased damage to arthropods.
minecraft:knockback: Increases the knockback effect on hit.
minecraft:fire_aspect: Sets target on fire when hit.
minecraft:looting: Enemies drop more and better loot.
minecraft:silk_touch: Blocks drop themselves instead of raw drops.
minecraft:fortune: Increases drop quantity from ores and crops.
minecraft:flame: Bow shots set targets on fire.
minecraft:infinity: Arrows are not consumed while shooting.
minecraft:multishot: Shoot 3 arrows at the cost of one.
minecraft:impaling: Tridents deal extra damage to underwater creatures.
minecraft:riptide: Throwing the trident propels you forward in water or rain.
minecraft:channeling: Strikes lightning when trident hits a target during storms.
minecraft:fire_protection: Reduces fire damage and burn time.
minecraft:thorns: Damages attackers when they hit you.
minecraft:frost_walker: Walk on water by freezing it beneath you.
minecraft:soul_speed: Move faster on soul sand and soul soil.
minecraft:density: Makes falling attacks with maces do more damage.
minecraft:wind_burst: Bounce into the air after a successful mace falling attack.
minecraft:luck_of_the_sea: Increases chance of fishing rarer loot.
minecraft:lure: Decreases the time taken to fish.
